overview: Winner of "Best of Show" at the 2013 World Ski and Snowboard Festival 'Olympus 72 Hour Filmmaker Showdown'. Nine films were pick out of about 43 films submitted to battle for Best of Show. Teams had 72 hours to shoot, edit and put together a film that is no longer than 5 minutes. This year's prop was a Japanese hand fan and had to be used in every film produced.
title: Katch-Up
